feed.title: Sauce Labs US West Data Center Status - Incident History

author.name: Sauce Labs US West Data Center

entry.title: 2020-Nov-14 Service Incident
entry.content:
Nov 14, 14:07 PST
Resolved - Tunnels are starting successfully. This incident has been resolved.

Nov 14, 13:51 PST
Monitoring - Tunnels in the US-West were unable to start. We have taken remedial action and are monitoring the recovery.

entry.title: 2020-November-13 Service Incident
entry.content:
Nov 13, 07:10 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 13, 07:01 PST
Monitoring - Sauce Connect tunnels were not starting, the REST API was not responding and the Sauce Labs dashboard was not loading. We have taken corrective action and these services are now available again. We will continue to monitor the situation.

Nov 13, 06:53 PST
Investigating - The Sauce Labs dashboard is currently not responding. We are investigating and evaluating whether any other services are affected.

entry.title: 2020-November-04 Resolved Service Incident
entry.content:
Nov 4, 04:09 PST
Resolved - Between 03:26am PST on Nov 3rd and 03:52am PST on Nov 4th, Sauce Connect tunnels were failing to start from Node.js based test frameworks using the node-saucelabs package. We have identified and fixed the problem. All services are fully operational.

entry.title: 2020-November-03 Resolved Service Incident
entry.content:
Nov 3, 06:00 PST
Resolved - Automated and Live RDC tests using Sauce Connect tunnels failed to start today between 4:39am and 5:49am PST. We quickly identified and fixed the problem. All services are fully operational.

entry.title: Sauce Labs Planned Maintenance
entry.content:
Oct 24, 10:59 PDT
Completed - The maintenance window has completed successfully. All systems are fully operational.

Oct 24, 10:00 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 16, 16:28 PDT
Scheduled - Sauce Labs will have a two hour previously scheduled maintenance window on Saturday, October 24th 2020, starting at 10:00am PDT and ending at 12:00pm PDT. During this maintenance window, we will be making updates to our infrastructure and services. These maintenance actions may cause portions of the service (including running automated and manual tests) to be unavailable for up to two hours.

entry.title: 2020-October-02 Service Incident
entry.content:
Oct 2, 04:59 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved and all services have returned to normal operation.

Oct 2, 04:30 PDT
Monitoring - We have taken steps to return service to normal levels, but we are continuing to monitor the situation.

Oct 2, 02:55 PDT
Identified - Automated and Manual PC, Mac, Emulator/Simulator and RDC via Unified Platform testing, REST API and Sauce Connect tunnels are currently unavailable. In addition, the US-West-1 Sauce Labs dashboard at https://app.saucelabs.com is unavailable. We have identified the issue and are working to restore normal service.

entry.title: 2020-September-21 Service Incident
entry.content:
Sep 21, 08:04 PDT
Resolved - The issue is resolved and all services are back to fully operational status.

Sep 21, 05:59 PDT
Update - We've made some changes to address the high wait times, but we are still seeing a high error rate with Mac and iOS simulator tests. We continue to investigate.

Sep 21, 04:26 PDT
Update - Wait times for Mac desktop and iOS simulator tests continue being elevated. Some new tests will timeout before the test starts. We are investigating.

Sep 21, 04:18 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Sep 21, 04:12 PDT
Investigating - Wait times for Mac desktop and iOS simulator tests are elevated. We are investigating.

entry.title: 2020-September-16 Service Incident
entry.content:
Sep 17, 00:23 PDT
Resolved - Live Testing functionality has been restored. All services are fully operational.

Sep 16, 23:45 PDT
Investigating - Live Testing sessions fail to open correctly for Emulators, Simulators and Desktop. Live Testing on Real Devices is fully operational. Our engineers are investigating.

entry.title: 2020-September-9 Service Incident
entry.content:
Sep 9, 12:48 PDT
Resolved - We have taken remedial action and the rest/v1.2/concurrency endpoint should return accurate data. Your concurrency meter in the user interface should also be working again.

Sep 9, 12:38 PDT
Investigating - The /rest/v1.2/users/USERNAME/concurrency endpoint is not showing an accurate concurrency value. We are investigating and taking remedial action. Your concurrency meter in the user interface may not show the correct value.

entry.title: 2020-August-30 Service Incident
entry.content:
Aug 30, 10:16 PDT
Resolved - The Real Device Cloud has recovered and all services are fully operational.

Aug 30, 08:14 PDT
Monitoring - All services are recovering and are fully operational. We are monitoring.

Aug 30, 07:18 PDT
Update - US Real Device availability continues to recover with over 90% of devices now available for testing.

Aug 30, 07:04 PDT
Update - We have made some changes to resolve the degraded performance of the Sauce Labs dashboard, but issues affecting the availability of real devices and access to https://app.testobject.com are ongoing.

Aug 30, 05:55 PDT
Identified - We are seeing some improvements, but the resolution of this issue is very much dependent on Level3/CenturyLink. https://app.testobject.com is available from some locations, but not others, and our Real Device availability is gradually recovering.

Aug 30, 05:05 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Aug 30, 05:04 PDT
Investigating - A major global internet provider (Level3/CenturyLink) is experiencing issues which are causing parts of our service to be unavailable or degraded. Currently Real Device testing, the legacy RDC UI at app.testobject.com and the Sauce Labs wiki are unavailable, and the Sauce Labs dashboard is experiencing intermittent issues.

entry.title: 2020-August-27 Service Incident
entry.content:
Aug 27, 16:59 PDT
Resolved - All our services have recovered successfully. All services are now fully operational

Aug 27, 16:25 PDT
Monitoring - After remedial action, traffic is flowing as expected. We will continue to monitor.

Aug 27, 16:14 PDT
Investigating - We have gotten multiple reports of slowness or inability to run automated tests or tunnels predominantly over AWS.
We are investigating and taking remedial action.

entry.title: Sauce Labs Planned Maintenance
entry.content:
Aug 15, 11:58 PDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. All services are fully operational.

Aug 15, 10:00 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 6, 15:42 PDT
Scheduled - Sauce Labs will have a two hour previously scheduled maintenance window on Saturday, August 15th 2020, starting at 10:00am PDT and ending at 12:00pm PDT. During this maintenance window, we will be making updates to our infrastructure and services. These maintenance actions may cause portions of the service (including running automated and manual tests) to be unavailable for up to two hours.

entry.title: 2020-August-05 Service Incident
entry.content:
Aug 6, 08:29 PDT
Resolved - We've continued to observe a return to normal operations and performance after taking remedial action. All services have been fully operational for the last 16hrs

Aug 5, 16:01 PDT
Monitoring - We've taken remedial action and have seen test times get back to normal thresholds. We are monitoring the state of tests.

Aug 5, 14:30 PDT
Update - We've ruled out a few parts of our service being the culprit as we continue to test to find root cause.

Aug 5, 12:54 PDT
Update - Slowness of tests is still seen across our clouds. We continue to investigate.

Aug 5, 12:16 PDT
Investigating - We have received multiple reports of slowness while running automated tests.
We are investigating.

entry.title: Sauce Labs Unplanned Maintenance
entry.content:
Jul 31, 21:41 PDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. All services are fully operational.

Jul 31, 20:00 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jul 29, 11:21 PDT
Scheduled - Sauce Labs will have an emergency scheduled maintenance window on Friday, July 31st 2020 starting at 8:00pm PDT and ending at 10:00pm PDT. During this maintenance window, we will be making updates to our infrastructure and services. These maintenance actions may cause portions of the service (including running automated and manual tests) to be unavailable for up to two hours.

entry.title: 2020-July-21 Service Incident
entry.content:
Jul 21, 07:40 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 21, 06:44 PDT
Identified - The issue is largely resolved, but test detail pages are currently unable to display assets (logs, screenshots, video). We continue to investigate.

Jul 21, 05:37 PDT
Investigating - The Sauce Labs dashboard at https://app.saucelabs.com is not responding. Automated testing, Sauce Connect tunnels and other services not requiring the UI are unaffected. We are investigating.

entry.title: Sauce Labs Planned Maintenance
entry.content:
Jul 18, 11:05 PDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. All services are fully operational.

Jul 18, 10:00 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jul 18, 09:44 PDT
Scheduled - Sauce Labs will have a two hour previously scheduled maintenance window on Saturday, July 18th starting at 10:00am PDT and ending at 12:00pm PDT. During this maintenance window, we will be making updates to our infrastructure and services. These maintenance actions may cause portions of the service (including running automated and manual tests) to be unavailable for up to two hours.

entry.title: 2020-July-01 Minor Service Incident
entry.content:
Jul 1, 21:58 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved and full functionality is restored. If you experience issues with our web application please contact support@saucelabs.com.

Jul 1, 21:49 PDT
Monitoring - We have identified the root cause as a service provider outage. Service is being restored by the provider and we are seeing a greatly reduced impact on our own services. We are continuing to monitor.

Jul 1, 21:33 PDT
Investigating - Interactions with the Sauce Labs web application take a long time to complete. Customers may notice pages becoming unresponsive for a period of time. We are investigating.

entry.title: 2020-June-25 (PST) Resolved Service Incident
entry.content:
Jun 25, 22:30 PDT
Resolved - This is an informational post only. Between 22:20 and 22:54 pm PST, customers were unable to start new Sauce Connect tunnels for the US Real Device Cloud. Sauce Connect and the Real Device Cloud are currently fully functional. If you are experiencing ongoing issues, please contact support@saucelabs.com.

entry.title: 2020-June-23
entry.content:
Jun 23, 01:37 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 23, 00:35 PDT
Monitoring - We have taken remedial action and are monitoring services to ensure correct functionality.

Jun 23, 00:04 PDT
Investigating - Sauce Connect Tunnels for US Real Device Testing are not starting, We are investigating the cause.

entry.title: 2020-June-04 (PST) Service Incident
entry.content:
Jun 4, 02:11 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 4, 00:32 PDT
Monitoring - We have taken remedial action and are monitoring services to ensure functionality.

Jun 4, 00:16 PDT
Investigating - Live Testing sessions against Real Devices are not starting reliably. Automated testing is unaffected. Our engineers are investigating.

During this maintenance window, we will be making updates to our infrastructure and services. entry.title: 2020-April-27 Service Incident
entry.content:
Apr 27, 14:02 PDT
Resolved - Dashboard, REST API and Sauce Connect tunnels have recovered.
All services are now fully operational.

Apr 27, 13:52 PDT
Update - We are taking remedial action. Sauce Connect tunnels and REST API are recovering.
We continue to investigate.

Apr 27, 13:15 PDT
Investigating - Our dashboard and REST API are not responding and failing to login.
Sauce Connect tunnels are not starting.
We are investigating.

entry.title: Sauce Labs Planned Maintenance
entry.content:
Apr 25, 11:19 PDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. All services are fully operational.

Apr 25, 10:01 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 17, 13:24 PDT
Scheduled - Sauce Labs will have a two hour previously scheduled maintenance window on Saturday, April 25th starting at 10:00am PDT and ending at 12:00pm PDT. During this maintenance window, we will be making updates to our infrastructure and services. These maintenance actions may cause portions of the service (including running automated and manual tests) to be unavailable for up to two hours.

entry.title: 2020-March-17 Service Incident
entry.content:
Mar 17, 12:00 PDT
Resolved - Tunnels and site are working reliably. All services are now fully operational.

Mar 17, 11:24 PDT
Update - Our engineers have taken remedial action and we are seeing tunnels and website load more reliably. We will continue to monitor.

Mar 17, 10:57 PDT
Investigating - app.saucelabs.com and saucelabs.com are not available or loading slowly. Additionally tunnels might be slow to load or unresponsive. We are investigating.

entry.title: 2020-March-12 Resolved Service Incident
entry.content:
Mar 12, 23:45 PDT
Resolved - Our Real Device Cloud stopped being available between 11:45 pm and 00:50 am (PDT), leading to failures for automated and live tests.
We have taken remedial action, and all services are now fully operational.
